files.patch: @@ -56,1 +56,1 @@ - * run-time package can be provided when the Package is defined. + * run-time package can be provided when the {@code Package} is defined. @@ -224,0 +224,7 @@ + * @apiNote + * Package sealing + * has no relationship with {@linkplain Class#isSealed() sealed classes or interfaces}. + * Package sealing is specific to JAR files defined for classes in an unnamed module. + * See the {@link Package Package} class specification for details + * how a {@code Package} is defined as sealed package. + * @@ -225,0 +232,1 @@ + * @@ -234,0 +242,7 @@ + * @apiNote + * Package sealing + * has no relationship with {@linkplain Class#isSealed() sealed classes or interfaces}. + * Package sealing is specific to JAR files defined for classes in an unnamed module. + * See the {@link Package Package} class specification for details + * how a {@code Package} is defined as sealed package. + *
